TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug being studied in the treatment of cancer. It is a type of topoisomerase inhibitor. It is related to the anticancer drug camptothecin.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que se estudia para el tratamiento del cáncer. Es un tipo de inhibidor de la topoisomerasa. Se relaciona con el medicamento contra el cáncer camptotecina.
